# Data import
```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
df_uni <- read.csv('data/shanghai-world-university-ranking.csv',
                   sep = ';',
                   na = "")
df_uni <- df_uni %>% select(-Geo.Shape)
```
```{r}
summary(df_uni)
```

```{r}
# Validating total scores
df_uni$Total.score.check <- .1 * df_uni$Alumni + .2 * df_uni$Award + .2 *df_uni$Hi.Ci + .2 * df_uni$N.S + .2 * df_uni$PUB + .1 * df_uni$PCP
df_check <- df_uni %>% select(World.rank.integer, University, Total.score, Total.score.check)
```
